segments.text: The NASDAQ gained a few points today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's hard to say . The stock market is weird . You never know what will happen tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why do you buy stocks , then ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's a kind of investment . If I choose a good stock and hold it long enough , I can get good returns .
segments.speaker: S1
